quests.title: First Steps
quests.description: The Elder Sage wants you to gather 5 oak logs to prove your resourcefulness.
completion_dialogue: Excellent work! You've proven yourself capable.
Take these rewards as a token of my gratitude.

quests.title: Material Research
quests.description: The Wandering Trader needs 3 copper ore and 3 iron ore for his studies.
completion_dialogue: Marvelous! These ores will be perfect for my research.
You have my deepest thanks, adventurer.

quests.title: Prove Your Worth
quests.description: The Battle Master challenges you to defeat 3 enemies to prove your combat prowess.
completion_dialogue: Impressive! You fight with the skill of a seasoned warrior.
I'm honored to grant you these rewards.
Continue honing your skills, and you'll become legendary!
